source.aa923b05:
# library
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import warnings
source.86bcd9cb:
#num_sequence_total is the number of genomic sequences processed per variant per country on a particular date.
#num_sequence is the number of sequences that got matched to a particular variant.
#perc_sequence is the percentage of matched sequences to a total number of sequences processed.
df
source.87e50a9f:
#separate variants data
omicron=df[df["variant"]=="Omicron"]
delta=df[df["variant"]=="Delta"]
beta=df[df["variant"]=="Beta"]
others=df[(df["variant"]!="Delta") & (df["variant"]!="Omicron") & (df["variant"]!="Beta")]
source.9ed8ec53:
#group by data with respect to date
omicron_world=omicron.groupby("date").sum()
omicron_world["date"]=omicron_world.index
delta_world=delta.groupby("date").sum()
delta_world["date"]=delta_world.index
beta_world=beta.groupby("date").sum()
beta_world["date"]=beta_world.index
others_world=others.groupby("date").sum()
others_world["date"]=others_world.index
source.ce41b542:
#plot cases of different variants in world 
plt.figure(figsize=(15,8))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_world['date'], y=omicron_world['num_sequences'],label="omicron_world")
sns.lineplot(x=delta_world['date'], y=delta_world['num_sequences'],label="delta_world")
sns.lineplot(x=beta_world['date'], y=beta_world['num_sequences'],label="beta_world")
sns.lineplot(x=others_world['date'], y=others_world['num_sequences'],label="others_world")
plt.show()
source.4e32f5ae:
#separate variants data for india
omicron_India=omicron[omicron['location']== "India"]
delta_India=delta[delta['location']== "India"]
beta_India=beta[beta['location']== "India"]
others_India=others[others['location']== "India"]
others_group=others_India.groupby("date").sum()
others_group["date"]=others_group.index
source.b9126760:
#plot cases of different variants in india
plt.figure(figsize=(15,8))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_India['date'], y=omicron_India['num_sequences'],label="omicron_India")
sns.lineplot(x=delta_India['date'], y=delta_India['num_sequences'],label="delta_India")
sns.lineplot(x=beta_India['date'], y=beta_India['num_sequences'],label="beta_India")
sns.lineplot(x=others_group['date'], y=others_group['num_sequences'],label="others_group")
plt.show()
source.7cdbf099: **In this notebook we will analyze the data of the omicron and delta variant to understand the current situation of the countries and to find the differences between these two variants.**
source.f6099cdf: **It's hard to understand the meaning of the variant "non_who" so we will ignore it.**
